update BTH_PAGY_CHK_INF
PAGY_SYS_NO = #{pagySysNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
REQ_CHK_TM = #{reqChkTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GET_CHK_ST = #{getChkSt,jdbcType=CHAR},
GET_CHK_RSPCODE = #{getChkRspcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GET_CHK_RSPMSG = #{getChkRspmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CRT_TM = #{crtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where PAGY_NO = #{pagyNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and CHK_DATA_DT = #{chkDataDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
